text: @GregAbbott_TX @JohnCornyn Great news. @GovAbbott fails to mention the 863 people who died from Covid19, with 23 more yesterday. Your words here are hollow. This is NOT an algebra equation. These are PEOPLE! Your opening is NOT hoing to end well.
